Name: General
Description: No special rules govern them as a group

Name: Item Creation
Description: Allow spellcasters to create magic items of all sorts

Name: Metamagic
Description: Allow spellcasters to modify their spells in various ways

Name: Fighter Bonus Feat
Description: Any feat designated as a fighter feat can be selected as a fighter's bonus feat. This designation does not restrict characters of other classes from selecting these feats, assuming that they meet any prerequisites.
